DOC.brief_summary: This study aim compare ventilation Distribution tidal Volume 6ml/kgBW tidal volume 10ml/kgBW laparoscopic nephrectomy patient
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Ventilation Distribution Between Tidal Volume 6ml/kgBW 10ml/kgBW
DOC.detailed_description: Approval Ethical Committee Faculty Medicine University Indonesia acquire prior conduct study . Subjects give informed consent enrol study . Non-invasive blood pressure ( NIBP ) monitor , electrocardiogram ( ECG ) pulse-oximeter set subject operation room . Anesthesia procedure epidural regional block . After give premedication ( midazolam 0.05 mg/kgBW fentanyl 1-2 ug/kgBW ) , induced propofol , 1-2 mg/kgbb , endotracheal tube intubation do facilitate atracurium 0.5 mg/kgbb . Mechanical ventilation set volume control mode , ( Positive End Expiratory Pressure ) PEEP 5cmH2O ( 5 centimeter water ) , O2 fraction ( FiO2 ) 30-50 % , target carbondioxide ( CO2 ) 35-45 % . Volume tidal give accord group ( 6 mL/kgBW 10 ml/kgBW ) . Hemodynamic , ventilation parameter , Electrical Impedance Tomography ( EIT ) parameter record . If desaturation happen intraoperatively manage increase FiO2 recruitment maneuver oxygen saturation ( SpO2 ) > 95 % . Data analyze use Statistical Program Social Sciences ( SPSS ) , numeric data use unpaired T-test Mann-Whitney-U test , categorical data use Chi-square Fisher Exact Test . Significant value p < 0.05 .
DOC.criteria: Subjects age 1860 year old Subjects good health condition ( suffer cancer , diabetes mellitus , kidney disease , cardiovascular disease , liver disease , hematologic disorder , HIV , hepatitis ) Subjects blood type renal recipient pass cross match test Subjects willing renal donor . Subjects pulmonary disease PaO2 ( arterial partial pressure oxygen ) /FiO2 < 300 mmHg Subjects Body Mass Index ( BMI ) > 30 kg/m2 Subjects mechanical ventilation 2 week prior surgery Subjects congestive heart failure Subjects neuromuscular disease . Drop criterion : Subjects intraoperative pulmonary complication due ventilation Subjects intraoperative cardiac arrest Subjects desaturation could manage FiO2 increase , PEEP recruitment maneuver , require tidal volume change .
